<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Monkey Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1232)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A single monkey can cause mischief. A troop of monkeys, emboldened by their numbers, can cause utter chaos, attacking anyone and looting anything in sight before scattering away with whatever they can carry.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Monkey Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1232)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 172</row>

**Perception** +8

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 20

**Immunities**
precision, [swarm mind](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=36)

**Resistances**
piercing 3, slashing 3

**Weaknesses**
area damage 3, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage 3

**Cacophony** ([auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206)) 20 feet. The monkeys' awful racket of screeches and howls drowns out other sounds. Any creature performing an [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) action in the area must yell over the din, requiring a successful DC 15 Fortitude save or [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) check to project loudly enough; on a failure, the action is lost.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 20 feet

**Ransack** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The swarm rummages through the possessions of a single creature within its space, attempting a [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) check against the creature's Reflex DC. On a success, the monkeys take one random item of negligible Bulk that the creature is wearing but not closely guarding, such as an object in a loosely carried pouch.

**Swarming Bites** <actions string="Single Action" />  Each creature in the swarm's space takes 1d8 piercing damage (DC 18 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-247" />
